description.jp:
エオルゼアで活動する組織「暁の血盟」
に属するララフェル族の賢人。天性の皮
肉屋で 直情的な相棒のイダとは意見が
ぶつかることもしばしば。エーテル学の
知識を有し 攻撃魔法である「呪術」の
巧者だが 不要な戦いは避け 堅実に勝
利を導くタイプ。
description.gl: While well-mannered in nature、 he is possessed of a sharp tongue and often bumps heads with his impulsive partner Yda. While thoroughly versed in thaumaturgy and an expert of black magic、 he only fights when he has to.

jp.text: そんなだから\nヤ・シュトラに更生してやるって言われるんだぞ！
しかし この数が相手では……
やれやれ 僕たちも嫌われたものだよ
……仕方ないな\n付き合ってやるよ
こうなりゃ 最後まで付き合うさ

gl.text: I feel it only fair to observe that one of us wouldn't recognize reason if it punched her on the nose.
Yes、 let's get back to being heavily outnumbered...
We may safely assume that our foe has thought to have us watched.
...I suppose I shall just have to join you.
Hah、 'tis hardly the first time. And I'll be damned if it will be the last.

desc.en:
3-HIT AoE Fire magic BRV + HP Attack executed twice
Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
Grants [Polyglot]
Extends the duration of existing buffs by 3 turns

While [Umbral Ice] is active:
• Becomes [Blizzard IV]
　∟ Raises BRV based on Initial BRV
　∟ Followed by 4-HIT Ice magic BRV + HP Attack
　∟ Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
　∟ Converts 20% of HP damage dealt to BRV
　∟ Grants [Polyglot]
　∟ Extends the duration of existing buffs by 3 turns
　∟ Turns back to [Fire IV] if [Umbral Ice] is inactive

While [Polyglot] is active:
• Slightly raises Attack
• [HP Attack], [HP Attack+ (Fire)], [HP Attack+ (Ice)] becomes [Foul]
　∟ 2-HIT AoE magic BRV + HP Attack
　∟ Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
　∟ 100% HP Damage dealt to all enemies
　∟ Consumes [Polyglot]
　∟ No action delay
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
　∟ Does not consume ability uses on the next turn
　∟ Reverts to standard [HP Attack] or its variants after use
desc.gl:
3-hit group Fire magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases special effect Polyglot by 1 (limit 1)
Extends own active buff duration 3 turns
Becomes Blizzard IV while Umbral Ice buff active
Slight ATK boost while special effect Polyglot 0
While special effect Polyglot 1:
 • Slightly increased ATK boost
 • HP Attack, HP Attack+ (Fire), HP Attack+ (Ice) become Foul
desc.jp:
3HIT火属性全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行う
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に特殊効果「ポリグロット」1加算（上限1）
自身に付与された強化効果を3ACTION延長する
強化効果「アンブラルブリザード」付与中
「ブリザジャ」に変化
特殊効果「ポリグロット」0の時 攻撃力小アップの効果
特殊効果「ポリグロット」1の時 さらに攻撃力小アップし
通常「HP攻撃」「HP攻撃＋（火）」
「HP攻撃＋（氷）」が「ファウル」に変化

desc.en:
「Astral Fire」 use +1

When using 「Astral Fire」: 
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4 HIT 
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
- Inflict 「Fire Resistance Down」 to all targets for 4 turns
- Slightly improves the effects of 「Astral Fire」

While 「Astral Fire」 is active:
- Turns 「BRV Attack」 into 「BRV Attack+ (Fire)」 
　∟ 2-HIT Fire magic BRV Attack
　∟ Moderately raises total BRV potency 
- Turns 「HP Attack」 into 「HP Attack+ (Fire)」 
　∟ Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ Followed by 2-HIT Fire magic BRV + HP attack
desc.gl:
Astral Fire use +1

When using Astral Fire:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • All targets: 4 turns Fire Resist Down
 • Slight Astral Fire buff boost

While Astral Fire buff active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Fire) (2-hit Fire magic BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Fire) (increases BRV based on own ATK before attack; 2-hit Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack)

・行動負荷がなくなる
・総ACTION数に加算されない
　召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される

「ファイジャ」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が合計6HIT増え
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限を小アップ
・対象に4ACTION「火耐性ダウン」付与

「ブリザジャ」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が6HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限を小アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限を中アップ
・対象に4ACTION「氷耐性ダウン」付与

「ファウル」使用時
・BRV攻撃のHIT数が4HITに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
